programme.desc: Bhide rushes to a tailor and begs him to stitch Madhavi's torn saree immediately. Things eventually take a dramatic turn as Madhvi walks into the tailor's shop.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Bhide heads to a mall to buy Madhavi a new saree after burning her old one by mistake. He eventually spots Madhavi at the mall and quickly hides.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
